title: Prevalence of Underdiagnosed Fragile X Syndrome in 2 Health Systems.
summary: This cross-sectional study examines the gap between best estimates of prevalence and clinical diagnosis of fragile X syndrome by mining the electronic health records of 3.8 million people in Wisconsin....
abstract: This cross-sectional study examines the gap between best estimates of prevalence and clinical diagnosis of fragile X syndrome by mining the electronic health records of 3.8 million people in Wisconsin.
